comments:
build N20040423

In the console output for the test run for this build, I see the following.
Not sure if this is a real problem or not, but it looks like an assertion 
failure is not being caught by JUnit because it's being thrown in an 
asyncExec, not the JUnit thread.

See also bug 59842 for the stack trace above this one in the console output.

That code is there to help us debug the test failure that we haven't been able to reproduce. Fixed it 
up to not call the assertion code until we're back in JUnit land.

Please verify fix to LineTrackerTests, DarinS. Hopefully, this will yield more useful info in the 
future.
